### INSTALL ###
IF(CMAKE_HOST_WIN32)
	IF(NOT EXISTS "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r10d/ndk-build.cmd")
		DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(www.internet.com/android-ndk-r10d-windows-x86.exe)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(${DKWEB}/Download/android-ndk-r10d-windows-x86.exe)
		DKSETPATH(${3RDPARTY})
		DKSET(QUEUE_BUILD ON)
		ANDROID_COMMAND(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/android-ndk-r10d-windows-x86.exe)
	ENDIF()
	GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(ANDROID_NDK "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r10d" ABSOLUTE)  #Get the windows short filepath
ENDIF()

IF(CMAKE_HOST_APPLE)
	IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r10d)
		DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(www.internet.com/android-ndk-r10d-darwin-x86_64.zip)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(${DKWEB}/Download/android-ndk-r10d-darwin-x86_64.zip)
		DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/android-ndk-r10d-darwin-x86_64.zip ${3RDPARTY})
	ENDIF()
ENDIF()

IF(CMAKE_HOST_LINUX)
	IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r10d)
		DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(www.internet.com/android-ndk-r10d-linux-x86_64.zip)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(${DKWEB}/Download/android-ndk-r10d-linux-x86_64.zip)
		DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/android-ndk-r10d-linux-x86_64.zip ${3RDPARTY})
	ENDIF()
ENDIF()
